desc_content.paragraph: Delete the active frame for the active Grease Pencil Layer
Delete the active frame(s) of all editable Grease Pencil layers
Make annotations on the active data

list_item.paragraph: mode (enum in ['DRAW', 'DRAW_STRAIGHT', 'DRAW_POLY', 'ERASER'], (optional)) – Mode, Way to interpret mouse movementsDRAW Draw Freehand, Draw freehand stroke(s).DRAW_STRAIGHT Draw Straight Lines, Draw straight line segment(s).DRAW_POLY Draw Poly Line, Click to place endpoints of straight line segments (connected).ERASER Eraser, Erase Annotation strokes.
stroke (bpy_prop_collection of OperatorStrokeElement, (optional)) – Stroke
wait_for_input (boolean, (optional)) – Wait for Input, Wait for first click instead of painting immediately

desc_content.paragraph: Insert a blank frame on the current frame (all subsequently existing frames, if any, are shifted right by one frame)

field_body.paragraph: all_layers (boolean, (optional)) – All Layers, Create blank frame in all layers, not only active

desc_content.paragraph: Apply tweaks to strokes by painting over the strokes

list_item.paragraph: mode (enum in ['SMOOTH', 'THICKNESS', 'STRENGTH', 'GRAB', 'PUSH', 'TWIST', 'PINCH', 'RANDOMIZE', 'CLONE', 'WEIGHT'], (optional)) – Mode, Brush modeSMOOTH Smooth, Smooth stroke points.THICKNESS Thickness, Adjust thickness of strokes.STRENGTH Strength, Adjust color strength of strokes.GRAB Grab, Translate the set of points initially within the brush circle.PUSH Push, Move points out of the way, as if combing them.TWIST Twist, Rotate points around the midpoint of the brush.PINCH Pinch, Pull points towards the midpoint of the brush.RANDOMIZE Randomize, Introduce jitter/randomness into strokes.CLONE Clone, Paste copies of the strokes stored on the clipboard.WEIGHT Weight, Weight Paint.
stroke (bpy_prop_collection of OperatorStrokeElement, (optional)) – Stroke
wait_for_input (boolean, (optional)) – Wait for Input, Enter a mini ‘sculpt-mode’ if enabled, otherwise, exit after drawing a single stroke
keep_brush (boolean, (optional)) – Keep Brush, Keep current brush activated

desc_content.paragraph: Create a set of predefined Grease Pencil drawing brushes
Select a Grease Pencil drawing brush

field_body.paragraph: index (int in [0, inf], (optional)) – Index, Index of Drawing Brush

desc_content.paragraph: Hide selected/unselected Grease Pencil colors

field_body.paragraph: unselected (boolean, (optional)) – Unselected, Hide unselected rather than selected colors

desc_content.paragraph: Toggle whether the active color is the only one that is editable and/or visible

field_body.paragraph: affect_visibility (boolean, (optional)) – Affect Visibility, In addition to toggling the editability, also affect the visibility

desc_content.paragraph: Lock all Grease Pencil colors to prevent them from being accidentally modified
Unhide all hidden Grease Pencil colors
Select all Grease Pencil strokes using current color
Unlock all Grease Pencil colors so that they can be edited
Convert the active Grease Pencil layer to a new Curve Object

list_item.paragraph: type (enum in ['PATH', 'CURVE', 'POLY'], (optional)) – Type, Which type of curve to convert toPATH Path, Animation path.CURVE Bezier Curve, Smooth Bezier curve.POLY Polygon Curve, Bezier curve with straight-line segments (vector handles).
use_normalize_weights (boolean, (optional)) – Normalize Weight, Normalize weight (set from stroke width)
radius_multiplier (float in [0, 1000], (optional)) – Radius Fac, Multiplier for the points’ radii (set from stroke width)
use_link_strokes (boolean, (optional)) – Link Strokes, Whether to link strokes with zero-radius sections of curves
timing_mode (enum in ['NONE', 'LINEAR'], (optional)) – Timing Mode, How to use timing data stored in strokesNONE No Timing, Ignore timing.LINEAR Linear, Simple linear timing.
frame_range (int in [1, 10000], (optional)) – Frame Range, The duration of evaluation of the path control curve
start_frame (int in [1, 100000], (optional)) – Start Frame, The start frame of the path control curve
use_realtime (boolean, (optional)) – Realtime, Whether the path control curve reproduces the drawing in realtime, starting from Start Frame
end_frame (int in [1, 100000], (optional)) – End Frame, The end frame of the path control curve (if Realtime is not set)
gap_duration (float in [0, 10000], (optional)) – Gap Duration, Custom Gap mode: (Average) length of gaps, in frames (Note: Realtime value, will be scaled if Realtime is not set)
gap_randomness (float in [0, 10000], (optional)) – Gap Randomness, Custom Gap mode: Number of frames that gap lengths can vary
seed (int in [0, 1000], (optional)) – Random Seed, Custom Gap mode: Random generator seed
use_timing_data (boolean, (optional)) – Has Valid Timing, Whether the converted Grease Pencil layer has valid timing data (internal use)

desc_content.paragraph: Convert 2.7x grease pencil files to 2.8
Copy selected Grease Pencil points and strokes
Add new Grease Pencil data-block
Unlink active Grease Pencil data-block
Delete selected Grease Pencil strokes, vertices, or frames

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['POINTS', 'STROKES', 'FRAME'], (optional)) – Type, Method used for deleting Grease Pencil dataPOINTS Points, Delete selected points and split strokes into segments.STROKES Strokes, Delete selected strokes.FRAME Frame, Delete active frame.

desc_content.paragraph: Delete selected points without splitting strokes

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['POINTS', 'BETWEEN', 'UNSELECT'], (optional)) – Type, Method used for disolving Stroke pointsPOINTS Dissolve, Dissolve selected points.BETWEEN Dissolve Between, Dissolve points between selected points.UNSELECT Dissolve Unselect, Dissolve all unselected points.

desc_content.paragraph: Draw a new stroke in the active Grease Pencil Object

list_item.paragraph: mode (enum in ['DRAW', 'DRAW_STRAIGHT', 'DRAW_POLY', 'ERASER'], (optional)) – Mode, Way to interpret mouse movementsDRAW Draw Freehand, Draw freehand stroke(s).DRAW_STRAIGHT Draw Straight Lines, Draw straight line segment(s).DRAW_POLY Draw Poly Line, Click to place endpoints of straight line segments (connected).ERASER Eraser, Erase Grease Pencil strokes.
stroke (bpy_prop_collection of OperatorStrokeElement, (optional)) – Stroke
wait_for_input (boolean, (optional)) – Wait for Input, Wait for first click instead of painting immediately
disable_straight (boolean, (optional)) – No Straight lines, Disable key for straight lines
disable_fill (boolean, (optional)) – No Fill Areas, Disable fill to use stroke as fill boundary

desc_content.paragraph: Duplicate the selected Grease Pencil strokes
Make copies of the selected Grease Pencil strokes and move them

list_item.paragraph: GPENCIL_OT_duplicate (GPENCIL_OT_duplicate, (optional)) – Duplicate Strokes, Duplicate the selected Grease Pencil strokes
TRANSFORM_OT_translate (TRANSFORM_OT_translate, (optional)) – Move, Move selected items

desc_content.paragraph: Enter/Exit edit mode for Grease Pencil strokes

field_body.paragraph: back (boolean, (optional)) – Return to Previous Mode, Return to previous mode

desc_content.paragraph: Fill with color the shape formed by strokes

field_body.paragraph: on_back (boolean, (optional)) – Draw On Back, Send new stroke to Back

desc_content.paragraph: Remove ‘no fill’ boundary strokes

field_body.paragraph: mode (enum in ['ACTIVE', 'ALL'], (optional)) – ModeACTIVE Active Frame Only, Clean active frame only.ALL All Frames, Clean all frames in all layers.

desc_content.paragraph: Remove loose points

field_body.paragraph: limit (int in [1, inf], (optional)) – Limit, Number of points to consider stroke as loose

desc_content.paragraph: Make a copy of the active Grease Pencil Frame

field_body.paragraph: mode (enum in ['ACTIVE', 'ALL'], (optional)) – ModeACTIVE Active, Duplicate frame in active layer only.ALL All, Duplicate active frames in all layers.

desc_content.paragraph: Generate automatic weights for armatures (requires armature modifier)

list_item.paragraph: mode (enum in ['NAME', 'AUTO'], (optional)) – Mode
armature (enum in ['DEFAULT'], (optional)) – Armature, Armature to use
ratio (float in [0, 2], (optional)) – Ratio, Ratio between bone length and influence radius
decay (float in [0, 1], (optional)) – Decay, Factor to reduce influence depending of distance to bone axis

desc_content.paragraph: Hide selected/unselected Grease Pencil layers

field_body.paragraph: unselected (boolean, (optional)) – Unselected, Hide unselected rather than selected layers

desc_content.paragraph: Interpolate grease pencil strokes between frames

field_body.paragraph: shift (float in [-1, 1], (optional)) – Shift, Bias factor for which frame has more influence on the interpolated strokes

desc_content.paragraph: Remove breakdown frames generated by interpolating between two Grease Pencil frames
Generate ‘in-betweens’ to smoothly interpolate between Grease Pencil frames
Add new layer or note for the active data-block
Change active Grease Pencil layer

Make a copy of the active Grease Pencil layer to new object

mode (enum in ['ALL', 'ACTIVE'], (optional)) – Mode

Move the active Grease Pencil layer up/down in the list

Move selected strokes to another layer

field_body.paragraph: layer (enum in ['DEFAULT'], (optional)) – Grease Pencil Layer

desc_content.paragraph: Enter/Exit paint mode for Grease Pencil strokes

field_body.paragraph: back (boolean, (optional)) – Return to Previous Mode, Return to previous mode

desc_content.paragraph: Paste previously copied strokes or copy and merge in active layer

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['COPY', 'MERGE'], (optional)) – Type

desc_content.paragraph: Create predefined grease pencil stroke shapes

list_item.paragraph: edges (int in [2, 100], (optional)) – Edges, Number of polygon edges
type (enum in ['BOX', 'LINE', 'CIRCLE'], (optional)) – Type, Type of shape

desc_content.paragraph: Reproject the selected strokes from the current viewpoint as if they had been newly drawn (e.g. to fix problems from accidental 3D cursor movement or accidental viewport changes, or for matching deforming geometry)

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['AXIS', 'PLANAR', 'SURFACE'], (optional)) – Projection TypeAXIS Axis, Reproject the strokes using the current lock axis configuration. This is the same projection using whiledrawing new strokes.PLANAR Planar, Reproject the strokes to end up on the same plane, as if drawn from the current viewpoint using ‘Cursor’ Stroke Placement.SURFACE Surface, Reproject the strokes on to the scene geometry, as if drawn using ‘Surface’ placement.

desc_content.paragraph: Show all Grease Pencil layers

field_body.paragraph: select (boolean, (optional)) – Select

desc_content.paragraph: Select a Grease Pencil sculpt brush

field_body.paragraph: index (int in [0, inf], (optional)) – Index, Index of Sculpt Brush

desc_content.paragraph: Enter/Exit sculpt mode for Grease Pencil strokes

field_body.paragraph: back (boolean, (optional)) – Return to Previous Mode, Return to previous mode

desc_content.paragraph: Select Grease Pencil strokes and/or stroke points

list_item.paragraph: extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Remove from selection
toggle (boolean, (optional)) – Toggle Selection, Toggle the selection
entire_strokes (boolean, (optional)) – Entire Strokes, Select entire strokes instead of just the nearest stroke vertex
location (int array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Location, Mouse location

desc_content.paragraph: Change selection of all Grease Pencil strokes currently visible

field_body.paragraph: action (enum in ['TOGGLE', 'SELECT', 'DESELECT', 'INVERT'], (optional)) – Action, Selection action to executeTOGGLE Toggle, Toggle selection for all elements.SELECT Select, Select all elements.DESELECT Deselect, Deselect all elements.INVERT Invert, Invert selection of all elements.

desc_content.paragraph: Select alternative points in same strokes as already selected points

field_body.paragraph: unselect_ends (boolean, (optional)) – Unselect Ends, Do not select the first and last point of the stroke

desc_content.paragraph: Select Grease Pencil strokes within a rectangular region

list_item.paragraph: xmin (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X Min
xmax (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X Max
ymin (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y Min
ymax (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y Max
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

desc_content.paragraph: Select Grease Pencil strokes using brush selection

list_item.paragraph: x (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – X
y (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Y
radius (int in [1, inf], (optional)) – Radius
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items

list_item.paragraph: only_selected_strokes (boolean, (optional)) – Selected Strokes Only, Only select the first point of strokes that already have points selected
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting all other selected points

desc_content.paragraph: Select all strokes with similar characteristics

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['LAYER', 'COLOR'], (optional)) – TypeLAYER Layer, Shared layers.COLOR Color, Shared colors.

desc_content.paragraph: Select Grease Pencil strokes using lasso selection

list_item.paragraph: path (bpy_prop_collection of OperatorMousePath, (optional)) – Path
deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting all other selected points

Join selected strokes (optionally as new stroke)

list_item.paragraph: type (enum in ['JOIN', 'JOINCOPY'], (optional)) – Type
leave_gaps (boolean, (optional)) – Leave Gaps, Leave gaps between joined strokes instead of linking them

desc_content.paragraph: Lock any color not used in any selected stroke
Separate the selected strokes or layer in a new grease pencil object

field_body.paragraph: mode (enum in ['POINT', 'STROKE', 'LAYER'], (optional)) – ModePOINT Selected Points, Separate the selected points.STROKE Selected Strokes, Separate the selected strokes.LAYER Active Layer, Separate the strokes of the current layer.

desc_content.paragraph: Simplify selected stroked reducing number of points

desc_content.paragraph: Simplify selected stroked reducing number of points using fixed algorithm

field_body.paragraph: step (int in [1, 100], (optional)) – Steps, Number of simplify steps

desc_content.paragraph: Split selected points as new stroke on same frame
Subdivide between continuous selected points of the stroke adding a point half way between them

field_body.paragraph: number_cuts (int in [1, 10], (optional)) – Number of Cuts

repeat (int in [1, 10000], (optional)) – Iterations
